question: What are your business hours?
answer: Our customer support is available Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM EST. For urgent issues outside these hours, please email support@company.com and we'll respond within 24 hours.

question: Do you offer student discounts?
answer: Yes! Students get 50% off any plan. Simply verify your student status using your .edu email address or student ID. The discount is valid for the duration of your studies.

question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time with no cancellation fees. Your service will continue until the end of your current billing period. After that, you won't be charged again.

question: Is my data secure?
answer: Yes, we take security very seriously. All data is encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256). We're SOC 2 Type II certified and fully GDPR compliant. We never sell your data to third parties.

question: How do I upgrade my plan?
answer: To upgrade: 1) Log in to your account, 2) Go to Billing section, 3) Click 'Upgrade Plan', 4) Select your new plan, 5) Confirm. You'll be charged the prorated difference immediately and the new features activate instantly.

question: What happens if I exceed my storage limit?
answer: If you reach your storage limit, you'll receive an email notification. You can either upgrade to a higher plan or delete old files to free up space. We provide a 10% grace period before blocking new uploads.

question: Do you have a mobile app?
answer: Yes! We have mobile apps for both iOS (App Store) and Android (Google Play). The apps are free and available to all subscribers. They sync seamlessly with your web account.

question: Can I get a demo before purchasing?
answer: Absolutely! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all Pro features. No credit card required. You can also schedule a personalized demo with our team by emailing sales@company.com.

question: What integrations do you support?
answer: We integrate with 100+ popular tools including Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Workspace, Salesforce, Zapier, Trello, Asana, and more. Enterprise customers can request custom integrations via our API.

question: How do I export my data?
answer: You can export all your data at any time: 1) Go to Settings, 2) Click 'Data Export', 3) Select format (CSV, JSON, or PDF), 4) Click 'Export'. You'll receive a download link via email within 24 hours.
